description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical

variable referring to the conditions in the pretest and the test. In the pretest the ape could choose between juice and air (nothing) or water. In the test they could face the weight or color conditions
variable referring to whether the juice was presented on the left or the right side during the pretest
variable referring to the choice for what they opened first during the pretest

variable referring to the order in which apes experienced the two test conditions. Apes in group 1 participated first in the weight trials followed by the color trials. Apes in group 2 received the trials in the opposite order

variable referring to the first 15 trials the apes participated in. For group 1 - block 1 referred to the trials of the weight condition. For group 2- block 1 referred to the trials of the color condition
position of the target bottle (either the heavy one in the weight condition or the white one in the color condition) out of five possible positions
position of the first bottle the apes opened during the test trial
